alert.note: Alert for Baca; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:09PM MDT until August 05 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 609 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 23 miles south of Lamar, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Two Buttes Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
